Draws a rounded rectangle on a bitmap.

Parameters:
Image Image to draw on
BoxColor The color that the box should be
XPosition The upper right corner's x position
YPosition The upper right corner's y position
Height Height of the box
Width Width of the box
CornerRadius Radius of the corners
Returns:
The bitmap with the rounded box on it
